name: Rupture
desc: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes a percentage of the distance traveled as damage.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Spirit Lance
desc: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Shadow Walk
desc: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.

name: Crypt Swarm
desc: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

name: Exorcism
desc: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 35 seconds.

name: Vampiric Aura
desc: Nearby friendly melee units restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units.

name: Lightning Bolt
desc: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.

name: Vengeance Aura
desc: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the physical damage of nearby friendly units. If an allied hero is slain under the aura, an illusion of your allied hero will be created to fight for that hero.

name: Global Silence
desc: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

name: Bloodrage
desc: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer. If you do not get the last hit, but are within 300 AoE of the dying hero, you will take 50% of the heal.
